original_text:
Jumping Jokers
Con la slot di frutta Jumping Joker si torna al classico universo Novomatic. La semplicità di gioco e la grafica colorata la rendono perfetta per gli amatori di questo genere, che riescono a fare a meno delle funzioni bonus, aiutati dai dinamici simboli jolly che si espandono ogni volta che atterrano. La mission di questo gioco? Far atterrare il jolly Jumping Joker su più rulli nello stesso giro per ottenere grandi risultati. Scopri di più nei prossimi paragrafi!
Allestimento e simboli di Jumping Jokers
Il layout di questa slot del provider Novomatic è piuttosto spartano: vedrai una raccolta di simboli fruttati che girano attorno ai semplici rulli viola. Il gameplay è composto da 5 rulli e 5 linee di pagamento fisse. Giocabile da 40 centesimi a 100 euro per giro su dispositivi desktop, mobili e tablet, questa classica macchina da frutta è un gioco semplice. Visivamente, Jumping Jokers è impostato su uno sfondo viola con bobine blu navy. Nella parte inferiore della tabella di pagamento sono presenti le seguenti icone:

icone dell’uva, dei limoni e dell’arancia – Ottieni 3, 4 o 5 di questi e vincerai un premio di 0,5, 1 o 5 volte la tua puntata;
icone delle prugne e dell’uva. Esse offrono pagamenti se 1, 2 o 10 volte la scommessa;
icona della campana offre pagamenti a 2, 5 o 20x
icone del melone offre pagamenti a 3, 8 o 30 volte la puntata
Il migliore dei simboli standard è la Stella d’Oro che offre pagamenti di 10, 50 o 100 volte la puntata se ottieni 3, 4 o 5 in combinazione

Quali sono i simboli speciali di questa slot senza registrazione?

The Jumping Joker è il simbolo selvaggio e può atterrare su tutti e 5 i rulli. Quando lo fa, si espande per riempire l’intera bobina wild. Meglio ancora se il Joker atterra su più rulli poiché diventeranno tutti selvaggi!
La Corona d’Oro che è lo Scatter Mistero – atterra 3 o più della corona e vincerai un premio speciale dalle seguenti gamme:


3 scatter pagano tra 2 e 100 volte la puntata
4 scatter pagano tra 10 e 500 volte la puntata
5 scatter pagano tra 100 e 1.000 volte la puntata.

Come si comporta il simbolo Jolly in The Jumping Joker?
Quando appare su una bobina, il jolly si espanderà e prenderà il controllo dell’intera bobina. Esso sostituirà anche tutti i simboli tranne il Mystery Scatter. Questo è rappresentato dalla Corona: quando 3 o più appaiono sui rulli, beneficerai di una vittoria misteriosa.
In cosa consiste la Vittoria Misteriosa?
La dimensione della vincita misteriosa dipende da quanti Mystery Scatter ottieni:

3 ti daranno tra 2 e 100 volte la puntata
4 ti ricompenseranno tra 10 e 500 volte la puntata.
5 ti regaleranno tra 100 e 1.000 volte la puntata totale!

 Impressioni finali su The Jumping Joker
La parte più interessante di questa slot gratis presente nella libreria dei nostri casinò ADM è sicuramente rappresentata dai Mystery Scatter. Ho avuto le mie maggiori vittorie dai wild in espansione quando ho ottenuto 4 rulli completamente selvaggi; questo mi ha portato una vincita pari a circa 400 volte la mia puntata. Un altro aspetto positivo di questo gioco è la sua varianza medio-alta, ideale per una partita fluida e poco complessa. Se stati cercando slot di frutta con più giri gratuiti e una grafica migliore, Novomatic ha molte opzioni, ti mostro le mie preferite:

https://www.slotjava.it/slot/supra-hot/
https://www.slotjava.it/slot/sizzling-6/
https://www.slotjava.it/slot/mega-joker/

raw_translation.response:
Jumping Jokers
Novomatic's classic fruit slot, Jumping Jokers, takes players back to the traditional slot universe. With simple gameplay and colorful graphics, it's perfect for fans of this genre who can do without bonus features, thanks to the dynamic wild symbols that expand every time they land. The mission of this game? To land the Jumping Joker wild on multiple reels in the same spin to achieve big results. Discover more in the following paragraphs!

Setting and symbols of Jumping Jokers
The layout of this Novomatic provider slot is quite spartan: you'll see a collection of fruity symbols spinning around simple purple reels. The gameplay consists of 5 reels and 5 fixed paylines. Playable from 40 cents to 100 euros per spin on desktop, mobile and tablet devices, this classic fruit machine is a simple game. Visually, Jumping Jokers is set on a purple background with navy blue reels. At the bottom of the paytable are the following icons:

grape, lemon, and orange icons - Get 3, 4 or 5 of these and you'll win a prize of 0.5, 1 or 5 times your bet;
plum and grape icons. They offer payouts of 1, 2 or 10 times the bet;
bell icon offers payouts of 2, 5 or 20x
melon icon offers payouts of 3, 8 or 30 times the bet
The best of the standard symbols is the Golden Star, which offers payouts of 10, 50 or 100 times the bet if you get 3, 4 or 5 in combination.

What are the special symbols of this slot without registration?

The Jumping Joker is the wild symbol and can land on all 5 reels. When it does, it expands to fill the entire wild reel. Even better if the Joker lands on multiple reels, as they will all become wild!

The Golden Crown is the Mystery Scatter - land 3 or more crowns and you'll win a special prize from the following ranges:


3 scatters pay between 2 and 100 times the bet
4 scatters pay between 10 and 500 times the bet
5 scatters pay between 100 and 1,000 times the total bet.

How does the Wild symbol behave in The Jumping Joker?
When it appears on a reel, the wild will expand and take over the entire reel. It will also replace all symbols except the Mystery Scatter. This is represented by the Crown: when 3 or more appear on the reels, you will benefit from a mysterious win.

What is the Mystery Win?
The size of the Mystery Win depends on how many Mystery Scatters you get:


3 will give you between 2 and 100 times the bet
4 will reward you between 10 and 500 times the bet.
5 will give you between 100 and 1,000 times the total bet!

Final impressions on The Jumping Joker
The most interesting part of this free slot in our ADM casino library is definitely represented by the Mystery Scatters. I had my biggest wins from the expanding wilds when I got 4 reels completely wild; this brought me a win of about 400 times my bet. Another positive aspect of this game is its medium-high variance, ideal for a smooth and uncomplicated game. If you've been looking for fruit slots with more free spins and better graphics, Novomatic has many options, and I'll show you my favorites:

https://www.slotjava.it/slot/supra-hot/
https://www.slotjava.it/slot/sizzling-6/
https://www.slotjava.it/slot/mega-joker/

The layout is spartan, with fruity symbols spinning around simple purple reels. The game is available to play on desktop, mobile, and tablet devices, with a betting range from 40 cents to 100 euros per spin. The game has a medium-high variance, making it ideal for players who want an uncomplicated game. Jumping Jokers has a Mystery Scatter symbol, represented by the Golden Crown, which can reward players with a mystery win depending on the number of scatters landed. Overall, Jumping Jokers is a simple fruit slot game that is perfect for fans of this genre who appreciate expanding wild symbols and mystery scatters.

Review: Jumping Jokers
Novomatic's classic fruit slot, Jumping Jokers, takes players back to the traditional slot universe. With simple gameplay and colorful graphics, it's perfect for fans of this genre who can do without bonus features, thanks to the dynamic wild symbols that expand every time they land. The mission of this game? To land the Jumping Joker wild on multiple reels in the same spin to achieve big results. Discover more in the following paragraphs!

Setting and symbols of Jumping Jokers
The layout of this Novomatic provider slot is quite spartan: you'll see a collection of fruity symbols spinning around simple purple reels. The gameplay consists of 5 reels and 5 fixed paylines. Playable from 40 cents to 100 euros per spin on desktop, mobile and tablet devices, this classic fruit machine is a simple game. Visually, Jumping Jokers is set on a purple background with navy blue reels. At the bottom of the paytable are the following icons:

grape, lemon, and orange icons - Get 3, 4 or 5 of these and you'll win a prize of 0.5, 1 or 5 times your bet;
plum and grape icons. They offer payouts of 1, 2 or 10 times the bet;
bell icon offers payouts of 2, 5 or 20x
melon icon offers payouts of 3, 8 or 30 times the bet
The best of the standard symbols is the Golden Star, which offers payouts of 10, 50 or 100 times the bet if you get 3, 4 or 5 in combination.

What are the special symbols of this slot without registration?

The Jumping Joker is the wild symbol and can land on all 5 reels. When it does, it expands to fill the entire wild reel. Even better if the Joker lands on multiple reels, as they will all become wild!

The Golden Crown is the Mystery Scatter - land 3 or more crowns and you'll win a special prize from the following ranges:


3 scatters pay between 2 and 100 times the bet
4 scatters pay between 10 and 500 times the bet
5 scatters pay between 100 and 1,000 times the total bet.

How does the Wild symbol behave in The Jumping Joker?
When it appears on a reel, the wild will expand and take over the entire reel. It will also replace all symbols except the Mystery Scatter. This is represented by the Crown: when 3 or more appear on the reels, you will benefit from a mysterious win.

What is the Mystery Win?
The size of the Mystery Win depends on how many Mystery Scatters you get:


3 will give you between 2 and 100 times the bet
4 will reward you between 10 and 500 times the bet.
5 will give you between 100 and 1,000 times the total bet!

Final impressions on The Jumping Joker
